title: Dice App – Roller for board games
summary: Nice dice roller to play your favorite board games.
description: Get free dice app and enjoy it on your phone or tablet. Roll random numbers to play any board game with your family and friends. Tap on the screen to roll up to 6 dice simultaneously. Application is also available on your smartwatch with Android Wear and on your Android TV. Features:• Replace your real physical dice with a better virtual solution• Throw multiple classic 6-sided dice and see their sum• Shake six dice at once to ensure support for any kind of board game• Immerse into beautiful and modern graphics This app is supported by ads that can be removed with one time in-app payment. Learn more and send feedback on http://android-dice.com
descriptionHTML:
Get free dice app and enjoy it on your phone or tablet. Roll random numbers to play any board game with your family and friends. Tap on the screen to roll up to 6 dice simultaneously. Application is also available on your smartwatch with Android Wear and on your Android TV.

Features:
• Replace your real physical dice with a better virtual solution
• Throw multiple classic 6-sided dice and see their sum
• Shake six dice at once to ensure support for any kind of board game
• Immerse into beautiful and modern graphics

This app is supported by ads that can be removed with one time in-app payment.

Learn more and send feedback on http://android-dice.com
comments: I'll use it till I develop one myself lol I don't know for sure if its agreement with Google play but you really need to put adverts on a 5 minute app code? Please
Programmed to run quickly, you don't have to wait watching rendered dice bouncing around. Would be good to be able to chance the colours though.
Good dice When we play ludo we use this app against dice it's very good and easy to play
Would be nice if I could lock in the value of some and re roll the others, like for Yahtzee.
Adverts. Seriously. Does the job but no adverts please..
It's nice Very useful for games
